about_the_game:
The official soundtrack to the game The Cyclist Tactics, composed by Michael Trott.
This album comprises 11 songs derived from the dynamically adaptive in-game music.
Each song pulls elements from the game music to create a fully realised individual track, all combined into a full length album.

In the game, the soundtrack comes in three layers for each of the five 10-minute tracks. The base layer always plays and basically is the chill version of the track. The middle layer adds more instruments, melodies and harmonies, along with some rhythm guitar. The top layer then adds drums and electric guitars to fully transform the chill track into a rocker. This transformation happens dynamically during gameplay as the race situation evolves.

The 11 tracks in the OST are comprised of one hand-crafted 'low-medium' and one 'medium-high' intensity version for each of the five in-game tracks, plus a bonus one on top of that.
